SourceText: Each child grows and learns in their own way. This tool can help you learn what activities your child can do.
text: 每个儿童都有自己独特的成长和学习进程，以下问题能帮你了解孩子目前的情况。

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty seeing or hearing sounds like peoples’ voices or music, even with glasses or hearing aids?
text: （即使戴眼镜或使用助听器时）你的孩子看东西或听声音，比如听其他人说话或听音乐，是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about your child's eyesight or hearing, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的视力或听力，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: Here are some resources that might help
text: 这里有些资源，也许对你有帮助：

SourceText: {development resources 1}
text: {development resources 1}

SourceText: Sorry, I dont' understand what you mean.
text: 抱歉，我没有理解你的意思。

SourceText: Compared with children of the same age, does your child have difficulty walking?
text: 与同龄儿童相比，你的孩子正常行走是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about your child's ability to move around, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的行走能力，也许可以听听专家的意见。

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty with self-care such as feeding or dressing him/herself?
text: 你的孩子在吃饭或穿衣等生活自理方面是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems like you are concerned about your child's ability to take care of themselves, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的生活自理能力，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty being understood by others?
text: 你孩子说的话，其他人理解起来是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child communicates, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的沟通能力，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty learning or remembering things, focusing on an activity that he or she enjoys doing, or accepting changes in his or her routine?
text: 你孩子在学习新事物、记住事物、集中注意力去做自己喜欢的事情，或接受日常生活习惯的变化等方面，是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child is able to think or understand things, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的认知能力，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: Compared with children of the same age, does your child have difficulty controlling their behaviour, such as fighting, screaming, or breaking rules?
text: 与同龄儿童相比，你的孩子在控制自己行为方面是否有困难，比如打架、尖叫或破坏规则？

SourceText: It seems like you are concerned about your child's behaviour, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的行为问题，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty making friends?
text: 你的孩子与人交朋友是否有困难？

SourceText: It seems that you're worried about your child's ability to interact with others, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的社会交往能力，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: How often does your child seem very anxious, nervous, worried, sad, or depressed?
text: 你的孩子多久会出现看上去非常焦虑、紧张、忧虑、沮丧或抑郁的情况？

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child is feeling, and you might need to seek advice from an expert.
text: 看起来你有点担心孩子的情绪状态，也许可以听听专家的意见。

SourceText: Thank you for taking the child ability test. If you have any concerns, make sure you seek opinion from an expert, e.g. a doctor.
text: 感谢你参与测试。如果你有任何疑虑，请及时寻求专家（如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生）的意见。

SourceText: It looks like your child is developing well. That's great!
text: 太好了，你的孩子正在健康成长！

SourceText: Remember, if you ever need support type {HELP}.
text: 如果你需要任何支持，请输入 {HELP}

SourceText: Every child grows and learns differently. This tool can help find areas where your child might need assistance. To make it work, you need to answer all 10 questions.
text: 每个儿童都有自己独特的成长和学习进程，以下问题能帮助了解孩子目前的情况。请确保回答所有的问题（共10题）。

SourceText: How much is your child doing each of these things?
text: 你的孩子做以下事情的频率如何？

SourceText: Names at least 5 body parts - like nose, hand, or tummy
text: 说出至少5个身体部位，如鼻子、手或肚子

SourceText: Climbs up a ladder at a playground
text: 能爬上梯子（如游乐场滑梯上的梯子）

SourceText: Uses words like "me" or "mine"
text: 使用如“我”或“我的”等此类的词语

SourceText: Jumps off the ground with two feet
text: 双脚跳离地面

SourceText: Puts 2 or more words together - like "more water" or "go outside"
text: 把两个或更多的词拼在一起，如“喝水”或“去外面”

SourceText: Uses words to ask for help
text: 使用词语求助（会用词语表达希望成人帮助取到东西等）

SourceText: Names at least one colour
text: 说出至少一种颜色

SourceText: Tries to get you to watch by saying "Look at me"
text: 说“看我”来尝试让你看向他/她

SourceText: Says his or her first name when asked
text: 当被问到时，他/她会说出自己的名字

SourceText: Draws lines
text: 画线

SourceText: Your child is growing and learning well. It is okay if they can't do everything mentioned in the questions. Most children can't do all of those things!
text: 感谢你参与测试。你的孩子成长得很好。即使孩子不能做到以上所有事情，你也不用担心。对这个年龄段孩子来说，这是正常的。

SourceText: If you ever need help, just type {HELP}.
text: 如果你需要任何帮助，请输入 {HELP}。

SourceText: It seems that you could benefit from expert opinion, for example, from a doctor. Make sure to check with one to see if your child is growing and learning well.
text: 感谢你参与测试。孩子目前得分较低，请你及时寻求专家的意见，比如村医、医院医生、卫生站医生，从而更准确地了解孩子的发展情况。

SourceText: Talks so other people can understand him or her most of the time
text: 大部分时间里，别人都能明白他/她说的话

SourceText: Washes and dries hands without help (an adult can help turn on the water)
text: 在没有他人帮助的情况下，自己洗手并擦干（成人可以帮忙拧开水龙头）

SourceText: Asks questions beginning with "why" or "how" - like "Why no cookie?"
text: 用“为什么”或“怎么样”提问，如“为什么没有饼干？”

SourceText: Explains the reasons for things, like needing a sweater when it's cold
text: 解释需要某样东西的原因，如天气冷的时候需要棉袄

SourceText: Compares things - using words like "bigger" or "shorter"
text: 使用如“更大”或“更短”等此类词语来比较物体

SourceText: Answers questions like "What do you do when you are cold?" or "…when you are sleepy?"
text: 回答如“你冷的时候会做什么？”或“你困的时候会做什么？”等此类的问题

SourceText: Answers questions like "What do you do when you are cold?" or "…when you are sleepy?
text: 回答如“你冷的时候会做什么？”或“你困的时候会做什么？”等此类的问题

SourceText: Tells you a story from a book or TV
text: 告诉你一个书上或电视上的故事

SourceText: Draws simple shapes - like a circle or a square
text: 画简单的图形，如圆形或正方形

SourceText: Says words like "feet" for more than one foot and "men" for more than one man
text: 会说如“双手”和“小朋友们”等此类词语来表示复数

SourceText: Uses words like "yesterday" and "tomorrow" correctly
text: 正确使用如“昨天”和“明天”等此类词语

SourceText: Stays dry all night
text: 整晚都不尿床

SourceText: Follows simple rules when playing a board game or card game
text: 玩棋盘或纸牌游戏时，遵循简单的规则

SourceText: Prints his or her name
text: 会工整地写自己的姓名

SourceText: Draws pictures you recognise
text: 你能看出来他/她画的东西是什么

SourceText: No Difficulty
text: 没有困难
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Some Difficulty
text: 有些困难
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: A Lot of Difficulty
text: 非常困难
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot See and/or Hear
text: 他/她完全看不见，（或）听不见
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Walk
text: 他/她完全无法做到
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Take Care of Themselves
text: 他/她完全无法自理
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Be Understood by Others
text: 别人完全无法理解他/她
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Learn, Remember or Focus
text: 他/她完全无法学习新事物、记住事物或集中注意力
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Control Their Behaviour
text: 他/她完全无法控制
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot Make Friends
text: 他/她完全无法与人交朋友
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Every Day
text: 每天
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Once A Week
text: 每周一次
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: About Once a Month
text: 大约每月一次
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: A Few Times Each Year
text: 每年几次
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Never
text: 从不
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Somewhat
text: 有时
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Very Much
text: 经常
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: no difficulty
text: 没有困难
note: This is an argument and it may be used to identify a corresponding quick reply

text: 有些困难
note: This is an argument and it may be used to identify a corresponding quick reply

text: 非常困难

text: 他/她完全无法学习新事物、记住事物或集中注意力
note: This is an argument and it may be used to identify a corresponding quick reply

text: 他/她完全无法控制

text: 他/她完全无法与人交朋友
